author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Come with us into the Underhells of Hive Secundus in our brand new Necromunda campaign, featuring Josh playing Ironhead Squats, Luka playing Goliath, and Skari playing the Palanite Enforcers with Matthew building scenarios and a huge interconnected table for everybody to play on.

*Two ways to view this full series:*
Based on all of your feedback, we've decided to not just make this available for our Vault members, but also for you who just want to buy it On Demand.

*On Demand:*
Pay once, and view the entire campaign as it comes out:
https://vimeo.com/ondemand/necromunda

*Vault Members, Watch Episode 2 Here:*
YouTube Members: https://youtu.be/yUviMopOLLA
Vault Members: https://www.miniwargaming.com/content/necromunda-into-the-underhells-ep-2

*Depths of Perdition*
Enter for a chance to win *1 of 2 pre-painted prototype Depths of Perdition tables*:
https://www.miniwargaming.com/perdition

*Necromunda Resources*
We used Munda Manager to manage all of our gangs:
https://www.mundamanage
title: NEW Necromunda Narrative Campaign - 4 Player FFA Into the Underhells!
